tool_description: Get started today and bring the world of competitive League of Legends to your users with the LoL Competitive Info API!
name: LoL Esports
title: LoL Esports

api_list.name: Get Match Window

required_parameters.name: gameId
required_parameters.description:
> integer <int64>

The game id of the match

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR
This is the locale or language code using [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) and [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

api_list.name: Get Match Details

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR
This is the locale or language code using [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) and [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

optional_parameters.name: participantIds
optional_parameters.description:
> string^\\\\d{1,2}(?:_\\\\d{1,2}){0,9}$

A list of the participant Ids separated by underscores and not commas

api_list.name: Get Schedule

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR
This is the locale or language code using [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) and [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description:
*string <byte>*
Base 64 encoded string used to determine the next \"page\" of data to pull

optional_parameters.name: leagueId
optional_parameters.description:
*Array of integers <int64>*
The id(s) of the league(s) you want details of

api_list.name: Get Standings
api_list.description: Get standings for a tournament id.

required_parameters.name: tournamentId
required_parameters.description:
*Array of integers <int64>*
The id(s) of the tournament(s) you want details ofs

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR

api_list.name: Get Leagues

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR
This is the locale or language code using [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) and [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lol-esports1.p.rapidapi.com/en-US/leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lol-esports1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lol-esports1.p.rapidapi.com/{locale}/leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lol-esports1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Teams
api_list.description: Get information about a team and its roster.

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description:
*string (locale)*
Enum: en-US en-GB en-AU cs-CZ de-DE el-GR es-ES es-MX fr-FR hu-HU it-IT pl-PL pt-BR ro-RO ru-RU tr-TR ja-JP ko-KR
This is the locale or language code using [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) and [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description:
Array of strings
The team slug(s).

You can input more than one slug.
